updates.content: The server that hosts our administrative area interface is down.
We’ve identified the issue. The Digital Ocean machine that hosts is having some networking/routing issues: we’ll keep you posted in real-time.
The machine is reachable and responds to ping if we perform the request from other locations, so this seems like a localized issue. We’re currently working on duplicating the machine.
The duplicate of the machine is almost ready, we should be up and running in approx 15 minutes.
The duplicate of the machine is online. Everything should be working, but we’re double checking everything.

Digital Ocean has just implemented a fix. More details here: https://status.digitalocean.com/incidents/fq8nt7bfrclx 

We’ll switch back to our original instance once everything is resolved.
